Vulois looks up at the female Predacon, who is actaully named 
Battera. He whispers to her in response.

"No, I need to stay here and talk with Hell Beast. If I can get on 
his good side it will make it easier for us to get back to Cybertron. 
Go as I said and find Soundwave and protect the TM3 driver. Without 
it, we will be doomed for our treason! But thanx for opening up this 
hole. Now I have an escape route if things get to ugly."

Vulois sits and waits for Hell Beast to respond.
